title: 求救! [ECON JJ入] interest rate 同PPP 一問

replies.msg:
平時一路學開interest rate 升currency 就appreciate

但係今日睇書有一part 話: “in a long run, interest rate rise will lead to decrease in money demand, hence causing price level to rise. According to the purchasing power parity condition, the increase in price level will then lead to a depreciation.”

個關鍵位係咪short run and long run

求大神指教

PPP short run 好難hold
多數係long run先hold
